projects.title: Temper for Client
projects.description:
Temper is a platform which helps to connect Freeflexers (freelancers) and Clients based in the Netherlands for the fields of Hospitality, Charity, Retail and Logistics. The client can have shifts based on the category at their locations. This application is for clients to perform their daily tasks at fingertips such as manage shifts for selected locations, accept/reject freeflexers to the shift by viewing their profile, and manage checkout flow of the freeflexer including payment.

● Technologies: Native android, Kotlin, MVVM, Android architecture components, Kotlin coroutines, Lottie, Unit testing, GraphQL, Dagger2, Firebase, Segment, Optimizely, Intercom

contributors.headline: Android Software Engineer at Vinted / Kleiderkreisel
Lead Android Developer at Disney+
Lead Android Engineer at Metro bank

projects.title: Temper for Freeflexer
projects.description:
This application for Temper Freeflexers (freelancers) to make their task easily at fingertips such as onboard to the platform, filter and apply for the shifts posted by Clients, add relevant experience to apply for shift, check-in/check-out to the shifts, manage a profile and much more cool features.

● Technologies: Native android, Kotlin, MVVM, Android architecture components, Kotlin coroutines, Lottie, Unit testing, REST API, GraphQL, Dagger2, Firebase, Segment, Optimizely, Intercom, Mapbox SDK

projects.title: Lolly
projects.description:
Lolly is a Shopping Gamification application. The game is associated with a specific shop and time duration. There's a set of questions per game and the user needs to complete within the given time period. The questions about products of a specific shop and user should be able to find the product and tap the barcode to complete a question. Some cool features like leaderboard, profiling, wallet and points to encourage users to maximize game experience.

● Technologies: React native, Barcode read library, Facebook SDK, Google SDK

projects.title: Cokeep
projects.description:
The Cokeep application connecting sellers and buyers for properties (lands, apartments, houses). Both parties can have their own customized profile and sellers can publish the property that they want to sell with the location, and buyers able to find and purchase/rent the property through an app with making payment.

● Technologies: Native android, Java, MVC, Google Map SDK, Google location search, Push notifications

projects.title: Food Runner
projects.description:
The Food Runner app makes it easy to order the favorite foods from different restaurants based in Sri Lanka. Mainly the project consists of separate applications for Restaurant, Consumer and for the Distributor to connect three parties. The Restaurant app users can manage their profile with food items available and Consumers app users can order foods from selected restaurants. The Distributors can register to the platform and deliver the foods to Consumers by picking the order from the Restaurant.

● Technologies: Native android, Java, MVC, Firebase, Pusher, Eventbus, Socket.io, Google Maps SDK

projects.title: Travel Lover
projects.description:
An android app helps to find the places in Sri Lanka and enables them to share experiences with their friends through social media features. The app geofence lots of historical places in Sri Lanka, when users enter to the geofence the app will automatically show the brief description of the place by tracking users current location.

● Technologies: Native Android, Java, MVC, Facebook SDK, Google Geofencing, Push notifications, Android Annotations, 

Spring, Hibernate (Backend)

projects.title: Clothsgram
projects.description:
This is a social media app specially designed to share the different kind items bought daily (Specially clothes). The User can post a photo and they can tap any place in the photo to tag the shop URL of the item they bought. Then followers will get notified of the post and shown in their wall. And they can share, like and comment on the post.

● Technologies: Native Android, Java, MVC, Android Annotations, Facebook SDK

projects.title: Chess Game
projects.description: Multiple user accessibility includes, a distribution network application which support to play Chess Game in comprehensive manner. The Chess game follows the basic rules of chess, and all the chess pieces only move according to valid moves for that piece. More than one couple can be played the game at once separately is the most valid activity in this chess game. Both players can have a simple chat with each other while playing chess game. And can have a chat with other login users too. Each player account is secured with password and can get player performance when they logged. Winning, loosing, no. of draw games of once can be get through the system. Before playing game one can check opponent player performance to get an idea about opponent playing ability. The interruption that can be issued through multiple user accessibility are well handled.

contributors.headline: Android Software Engineer at Vinted / Kleiderkreisel

projects.title: Relief Holdings Management System
projects.description: A Single user login capable standalone application having managing Relief Holdings System tasks and except reports form billing items. Both cash and credit payments can be made through the system. Notify messages displayed when an item reached re-order level and before 3 days from due date of purchase order.  Daily cash Reconciliation is generated automatically. High security backup system is included in the system.  User get user friendly system to satisfy requirements in master manner.

authors.headline: Android Software Engineer at Vinted / Kleiderkreisel

profile_positions.description:
- Identify operational feasibility of solution by evaluating problem definition, requirements and demonstrate solution by documentation, flowcharts and diagrams.
- Involve to the architectural design of the applications while giving necessary feedback.
- Implement, test and publish Temper applications to the Playstore and maintain them according to company standards.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams and provide the best technical solution for the android application
- Accomplish organization mission for the quarter by completing related tasks adhering to the timeline
- Maintain the quality of the applications through code reviews and pair programming.
- Experimenting the new technologies and introducing suitable methodologies to the application.
profile_positions.title: Senior Android Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Implement new features, debug, identify bottlenecks and fix existing bugs in the android application.
- Implement unit tests including edge cases to maintain the application quality.
- Bi-weekely reporting to the team lead.
- Improve code base through continuous refactoring.
- Proofreading code, correcting mistakes before each release of the application.
- Discover and learn new technologies which can bring the application to the next level.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer - Android

profile_positions.company: Crowderia AB - Your Digital Solutions Partner
profile_positions.description:
- Implement new features, debug, and fix existing bugs in both internal and external android applications.
- Implement unit tests including edge cases to maintain the application quality.
- Weekly meetup with clients to gather requirements and discuss about the delivery schedules.
- Daily report to the senior engineer.
- Pair programming with senior team members
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Implement new features, debug, and fix existing bugs in both internal and external android applications.
- Implement unit tests including edge cases to maintain the application quality.
- Guide interns to complete the tasks and learn technology.
- Provide daily builds and deliverables to the team lead.
profile_positions.title: Associate Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Learn Android and clarify the technical concerns from the senior team members.
- Implement new features, debug, and fix existing bugs in both internal and external android applications.
- Participate for client meetings and learn requirement gathering techniques.
- Continuously discover and learn technologies to enhance knowledge in the development career path.
